AUTHOR: Mr Boo Grande
INSTALL_MSG:
You have successfully installed WebServer. Special thanks to Paddo for inspiring me with his StatisticsPlus cog :heart:

Use the Permissions cog by Will to limit access to `[p]webserver link` if you don't want your IP to be posted publically. Or create a reverse proxy and change the url with `[p]webserver url`
NAME: webserver
DESCRIPTION: Host your own http server without any knowledge needed!
